title: VUWAE 15, Darwin Mountains, Antarctica
creator_credit: John Pettigrew, Peter Barrett and Victoria University of Wellington Antarctic Expedition
brief_description: Shows the geological research carried out by members of the fifteenth Victoria University of Wellington Antarctic Expedition (VUWAE 15). A party of four measure and describe the exposed outcrops of the Darwin Mountains, part of the Transantarctic Mountains. Presents a detailed description of the geology of the area.
